short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open pages in Google Search Console with specified time range

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Google Search Console chrome extension is designed for website owners, SEO specialists, and digital marketers. It generates Google Search Console performance report URL based on the configuration and opens it in a new tab.

Here's how to get started with the Search Console extension:
ðŸ‘‰ Install the extension and open it
ðŸ‘‰ Select your search console property type and enter the resource ID
ðŸ‘‰ Choose the default time range for the performance report and save it
ðŸ‘‰ Open any web page on your site, right click and select "Open in Search Console."

In case you're facing any issues, re-check the resource ID value you've added. You must have access to the respective Google Search Console property in your account to access its reports. 

NOTE: Our extension does not access any of your Google Search Console data.
